entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RELEASE OF GLACIER DAMMED LAKE ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER... WATER LEVELS ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER, ALASKA BEGAN RISING BEYOND THE NORMAL DAILY RISE ON SUNDAY NIGHT. THE RIVER HAS BEEN RISING AT APPROXIMATELY 1 FOOT IN 18 HOURS. IN THE PAST THIS EVENT IS ABOUT 4 DAYS LONG FROM START TO FINISH, WHICH WOULD PUT THE CREST ON THURSDAY THE 29TH. HOWEVER, THIS IS AN EARLIER THAN NORMAL

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:03PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Colville River This Week... Runoff from heavy rainfall over the upper Colville River Basin will be moving downriver this week. Between 1.00 to 1.75 inches of rain fell between Sunday morning to Monday morning in the foothills of the Brooks Range. Water levels will rise significantly and may approach bankfull in some low lying areas.
